page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: {Lower Woodsfield Farm,Madresfield.} Farmer: Mr.Nugent. Farmhouse 30 yrs old. 250 acres. 8 buildings, including a Dutch Barn. 450 sheep. One sheep dog. Cereals,root crops,hay,field beans. Heavily mechanised. 2 workers. {Grove House Farm,Guarlford. Farmer: Mr.and Mrs.F.R.Hawkins. Farmhouse about 150 yrs old.365 acres. Livestock buildings,grain store, various older buildings. 600 sheep,30 hens.Silage,hay,cereals, root crops. Highly mechanised. 2 workers. The farm is reputedly the site of an old village, so it has been worked for a long time _ it was a clearing in the Malvern Chase. Romans digging marl for building caused present day ponds.
